abstract: Shares in the New Oriental Education and Technology Group, a Chinese company listed in the United States, plunged 35 percent on Wednesday after the Muddy Waters research firm accused it of being a fraud.
snippet: Shares in the New Oriental Education and Technology Group, a Chinese company listed in the United States, plunged 35 percent on Wednesday after the Muddy Waters research firm accused it of being a fraud.
lead_paragraph: It has surely been one of the roughest weeks that New Oriental Education and Technology Group has ever experienced.

headline.main: Muddy Waters Deals Blow to a Chinese Education Company

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
